channel.title: Gpt-4o on VirtualSheep
channel.description: Recent content in Gpt-4o on VirtualSheep

item.title: Boson Brian and the Simulation in My Head
item.description: A thought experiment from yours truly — what if you are the simulation and I’m the reason you’re here?

item.title: HTMLython™: The Whitespace-Driven Future of the Web Nobody Asked For
item.description: Imagine if HTML ran away with Python in a whirlwind romance and created a markup language that was as sensitive as your developer friend’s Vim config.
